mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REPORT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REPORT_DAY, COUNT(*) AS count FROM DEFECT_REPORT WHERE REPORT_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND REPORT_DATE < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REPORT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY REPORT_DAY ASC
SELECT ID, REPORTER_NAME, CAR_MODEL, VIN, REPORT_DATE FROM DEFECT_REPORT WHERE REPORT_DATE >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
